author: andschwa
body:
- Set to 14 allowed Pester test failures because of non-tty and random process failures.
- Add badge to readme
- Use language 'cpp' because 'csharp' would bring in Mono
- Set to Trusty Tahr (Ubuntu 14.04)
- Only clone necessary submodules
- Use SSH for powershell-ci user access
- Install dotnet-cli
- Build PowerShell
- Run Pester tests
title: Enable Travis CI
